result.eng: I went for a job interview.

result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé faoi agallaṁ le haġaiḋ poistI went for a job interview.

result.eng: Do you mean to carry on?
result.ga: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.orig: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.html: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidhDo you mean to carry on?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aġaiḋDo you mean to carry on?

result.eng: Go on!
result.ga: Ar aghaidh leat
result.orig: Ar aghaidh leat
result.html: Ar aghaidh leatGo on!
result.ponchtml: Ar aġaiḋ leatGo on!

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: I'm always biking against the wind.
result.ga: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí
result.orig: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaí
result.html: Bím ag rothaíocht in aghaidh na gaoithe i gcónaíI'm always biking against the wind.
result.ponchtml: Bím ag roṫaíoċt in aġaiḋ na gaoiṫe i gcónaíI'm always biking against the wind.

result.eng: Wind the tape forward.
result.ga: Cuir an téip ar aghaidh
result.orig: Cuir an téip ar aghaidh
result.html: Cuir an téip ar aghaidhWind the tape forward.
result.ponchtml: Cuir an téip ar aġaiḋWind the tape forward.

result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?

result.eng: I ate beans for breakfast.

result.ponchtml: D'iṫ mé pónairí le haġaiḋ bricfeastaI ate beans for breakfast.

result.eng: He prepared for the journey.

result.html: D'ullmhaigh sé le haghaidh an turaisHe prepared for the journey.

result.orig: In aghaidh an rúin
result.html: In aghaidh an rúinAgainst the motion.

result.eng: The child's face lit up with joy.

result.html: Las aghaidh an pháiste le háthasThe child's face lit up with joy.
result.ponchtml: Las aġaiḋ an ṗáiste le háṫasThe child's face lit up with joy.

result.eng: Keep going to the crossroads and turn left.

result.ponchtml: Lean ar aġaiḋ go dtí an crosḃóṫar agus tiontaiġ ar ċléKeep going to the crossroads and turn left.

result.eng: If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ga: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.orig: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50
result.html: Má leanann tú ar aghaidh mar sin beidh tú marbh faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.
result.ponchtml: Má leanann tú ar aġaiḋ mar sin beiḋ tú marḃ faoi 50If you continue like that, you will be dead by 50.

result.eng: They did it against my will.
result.ga: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola é
result.orig: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola é
result.html: Rinne siad in aghaidh mo thola éThey did it against my will.
result.ponchtml: Rinne siad in aġaiḋ mo ṫola éThey did it against my will.

result.eng: The café is opposite the library.

result.ponchtml: Tá an caifé ar aġaiḋ na leaḃarlainneThe café is opposite the library.

result.eng: Go straight ahead and turn left.

result.eng: It is straight ahead.

result.html: Tá sí díreach ar aghaidhIt is straight ahead.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí díreaċ ar aġaiḋIt is straight ahead.

result.eng: Would you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.eng: A large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ga: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.orig: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidh
result.html: Bhí slua mór daoine bailithe timpeall an tí agus dreach an bhróin ar a n-aghaidhA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí slua mór daoine bailiṫe timpeall an tí agus dreaċ an ḃróin ar a n-aġaiḋA large crowd of people was gathered around the house with looks of sadness on their faces.

result.eng: Mother started looking worried.
result.ga: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na máthar

result.html: Tháinig dreach imníoch ar aghaidh na mátharMother started looking worried.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig dreaċ imníoċ ar aġaiḋ na máṫarMother started looking worried.

result.eng: The man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.orig: Bhrúigh an fear a shrón in aghaidh na fuinneoige agus rinne straois

result.ponchtml: Ḃrúiġ an fear a ẛrón in aġaiḋ na fuinneoige agus rinne straoisThe man pushed his face against the window and made a grimace.

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.

result.eng: They continued spying.

result.html: Lean siad ar aghaidh ag spiaireachtThey continued spying.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.html: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críoċnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíċe seaċt lá in aġaiḋ na seaċtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: A smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ga: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.orig: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteora
result.html: Bhris meangadh gáire amach ar aghaidh an fháilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.
result.ponchtml: Ḃris meangaḋ gáire amaċ ar aġaiḋ an ḟáilteoraA smile broke out on the receptionist's face.

result.eng: Milosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ga: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.orig: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don Iúgslaiv
result.html: Níorbh é Milosevic amháin faoi ndear gach coir in aghaidh na daonnachta a tharla tráth titim as a chéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ é Milosevic aṁáin faoi ndear gaċ coir in aġaiḋ na daonnaċta a ṫarla tráṫ titim as a ċéile don IúgslaivMilosevic was not solely responsible for every crime against humanity that happened while Yugoslavia was falling apart.

result.eng: I told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ga: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.orig: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsa
result.html: Dúirt mé le mo chomharsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aghaidh go dtí mo cheann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.
result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé le mo ċoṁarsa ar an eitleán go mbeinn ag tógáil bus ar aġaiḋ go dtí mo ċeann cúrsaI told my neighbour on the plane that I would then be taking the bus to my destination.

result.eng: It wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta
result.orig: Níorbh fhada gur thosaigh feachtais in aghaidh na sclábhaíochta

result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada gur ṫosaiġ feaċtais in aġaiḋ na scláḃaíoċtaIt wasn't long until anti-slavery campaigns started.

result.eng: By 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ga: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Faoi 1865 bhí úinéaracht daoine in aghaidh an dlí in gach ceann de na Stáit AontaitheBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.
result.ponchtml: Faoi 1865 ḃí úinéaraċt daoine in aġaiḋ an dlí in gaċ ceann de na Stáit AontaiṫeBy 1865, owning people was against the law in each of the United States.

result.eng: Come on in. Sit down.
